variables.description: The availability zone in which you want the subnet. Default: AWS selects a zone                   for you (recommended).
variables.name: AvailabilityZone

variables.description: The CIDR block that you want the subnet to cover (for example,                      "10.0.0.0/24").
variables.name: CidrBlock

variables.description: Indicates whether instances that are launched in this subnet receive a public                   IP address. By default, the value is false.
variables.name: MapPublicIpOnLaunch

variables.description: An arbitrary set of tags (key-value pairs) for this subnet.
variables.name: Tags

variables.description: A Ref structure that contains the ID of the VPC on which you want to create the                   subnet. The VPC ID is provided as the value of the "Ref" property, as: {                      "Ref": "VPCID" }.
variables.name: VpcId

variables.description: Returns the availability zone (for example, "us-east-1a") of                      this subnet.
variables.name: AvailabilityZone
